title: Abundance
format: Speed round exercise proposed by Stacey Druss
mainTopics: Defining abundance - what it is (not how/why/when/where)

speedRoundDefinitions.format: Quick title/phrase/headline/bumper sticker - what abundance IS only

definitions.speaker: Stacey Druss
definitions.definition: Having what you need when you need it

definitions.speaker: Gil Friend
definitions.source: Pirkei Avot (Jewish wisdom): 'Who is rich? The person who is content with their lot'

definitions.speaker: jessie (Jessie Upp)
definitions.expansion: Overlap of what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what you can get paid for

definitions.speaker: Klaus Mager
definitions.definition: To be at peace with the gifts you have been given

definitions: Having what you need when you need it
sufficiency.theme: Enough-ness as abundance - not excess but adequacy or slightly more
sufficiency.tension: Jerry's 'more than enough' described as controversial - implies abundance requires surplus?

innerState.theme: Abundance as internal state of being, not external having
innerState.wisdom: Jewish tradition, spiritual peace, Beatles wisdom

alignment.theme: Abundance as being in right relationship - with self, world, others

frameworks.name: Ikigai
elements: What you can get paid for
frameworks.abundance: Living at intersection of all four

frameworks.name: Pirkei Avot
frameworks.source: Jewish wisdom - Ethics of the Fathers
frameworks.question: Who is rich?
frameworks.answer: The person who is content with their lot

frameworks.name: Speed Round Exercise
frameworks.purpose: Get diverse definitions on table before discussion

staceyEmail.proposal: Speed round before usual conversation rounds
staceyEmail.closing: 'Thank you for attention to this matter' with wink
staceyEmail.parallel: Mocking Trump Truth Social posts ending with same phrase

gilWithdrawal.context: Before call started, Gil discussing Zoom assistant addiction and Facebook withdrawal
gilWithdrawal.jerryReference: French Connection 2 - Popeye Doyle heroin addiction and cold turkey withdrawal
gilWithdrawal.theme: Digital addiction as modern abundance problem?

alexPowerCuts.context: Alex warned about UK power cuts, new substation improvements not working
alexPowerCuts.commentary: 'They spent money, economy worked, people got shares, system kicks on, moves on'

participationNotes.Stacey Druss: Proposed exercise format, went first with definition
participationNotes.Gil Friend: Jewish wisdom contribution, recovering from Facebook withdrawal
participationNotes.jessie (Jessie Upp): Ikigai framework - recall from Call 02 DayBalancer project
participationNotes.Jerry Michalski: 'More than enough' described as controversial - suggests abundance requires surplus

emotionalTone: Lighthearted opening (withdrawal jokes, power cuts), focused speed round, efficient and pithy
specialNotes: Stacey's speed round format worked well - people were 'pithy and right on mission'
Jerry surprised how early in call everyone was so focused
Ikigai returns from Call 02 (Jessie Upp's framework)
Gil's Jewish wisdom perfectly aligned with abundance theme
Jerry's 'more than enough' as controversial suggests group tension about what abundance means
Alex passed - consistent with Call 05 solution-orientation, may not engage with definitional exercises
Multiple spiritual/wisdom traditions invoked (Jewish, Japanese, Beatles)
Trump Truth Social reference shows political context bleeding into calls
crossCallThemes: Individual vs collective (sufficiency vs infinite possibility)
Scarcity vs abundance mindset (connects to Call 02 Jessie's theme)

connectionsToOtherCalls.call02: Jessie Upp's Ikigai from DayBalancer project returns as abundance definition
connectionsToOtherCalls.call05: Alex passing on exercise consistent with solution-orientation (lost in process)
connectionsToOtherCalls.call06: Klaus's peace/gifts theme connects to his regenerative food pivot
connectionsToOtherCalls.call07: Definition exercise after Call 07 collaboration definition debate - format learning?

metaObservations.formatInnovation: Stacey's speed round prevented extended definition debate (unlike Calls 05 and 07)
metaObservations.diversity: Wide range from material ('what you need'), spiritual ('peace'), relational ('co-intelligence'), to unlimited ('infinite possibility')
metaObservations.jerrysControversy: His 'more than enough' suggests abundance requires surplus - others focused on sufficiency or contentment
metaObservations.staceyWisdom: Format worked - got diverse views quickly without debate
metaObservations.alexPattern: Passing on exercise consistent with his Call 05 feedback about process-oriented discussions
